righthandWords.words: I would have missed the start of the show.|I wouldn't have missed the start of the show.|I'll miss the start of the show.|I won't miss the start of the show.|I won't go to the show.|provided you come with me.|as long as you came with me.|if you had come with me.

lefthandWords.words: If I hadn't been there on time,|If I had been there on time,|If I don't get there on time,|If I get there on time,|Unless you come with me,|I'll go to the show|I'd go to the show|I would have gone to the show
